/opt/rocm/bin/hipcc  -fsanitize=address --offload-arch=gfx90a:xnack+ -shared-libsan -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/inline_asm.dir/inline_asm.cpp.o  -o inline_asm  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib /opt/rocm/lib/libamdhip64.so.6.0.60100 /opt/rocm-6.1.0-13031/lib/llvm/lib/clang/17.0.0/lib/linux/libclang_rt.builtins-x86_64.a
